alert.note: Alert for Brown; McCulloch; San Saba (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS San Angelo (Central Texas San Angelo)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 19 at 7:40PM CDT until May 19 at 8:45PM CDT by NWS San Angelo
info.description: The National Weather Service in San Angelo has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southwestern Brown County in west central Texas... Northeastern McCulloch County in west central Texas... Northwestern San Saba County in west central Texas... * Until 845 PM CDT. * At 739 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Fife, or near Lohn, moving east at 15 mph. HAZARD...Ping pong ball size hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * This severe thunderstorm will be near... Placid around 810 PM CDT. Mercury and Winchell around 825 PM CDT. Elm Grove around 845 PM CDT. Other locations impacted by this severe thunderstorm include Milburn, Us-190 Near The Mcculloch-San Saba County Line, Fife and Hall. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.50 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
